434.source:
function makeConnection(m1, m2) {
    c = $world.openPartItem("Connector", "PartsBin/Jens")
    c.isDerivationConnection = true
    c.openInWorld()
    c.setOpacity(0.5)
    c.connect(m1, m2)
    c.isEpiMorph = true
    c.ignoreEvents()
    return c
}
